scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run dev:core" "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:proxy"
scripts.dev:server: bun run build:core && bun run --cwd packages/server dev
scripts.build: concurrently "bun run build:core" "bun run build:server" "bun run build:proxy" "bun run build:www"
scripts.build:release: bun run build:core && bun run --cwd packages/server build:release
scripts.check: bun run --cwd packages/core check && bun run --cwd packages/server check && bun run --cwd www check
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules dist packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist www/node_modules www/dist
